name: PicoCharging_Get
description: Gets the active charging data of a pico station

$block: Container class for the pico charging station API

$ul: **ActiveChargingEnergy**: The energy used by this active charging (in kWh)
**ActiveChargingPower**: The power of the active charging (in kW)
**ConnectionMode**: The mode how this station is connected to the cloud
**Duration**: The duration of this charging in seconds
**LastWarningOrError**: The last warning or error of the station. This message is only shown if the warning or error happend in the last 5 minutes.
**LastWarningOrErrorMessage**: The message of the last warning or error of the station.
**LastWarningOrErrorTime**: The time when the LastWarningOrError happend
**LoadSheddingState**: Max. dynamic current (e.g. set over API or Modbus TCP) of this station or the loadmanagement group of the station if the station is in a group. in A
**LoadmanagementGroupName**: The name of the loadmanagement group. Or string.empty if the station is not in a group
**MaxAllowedChargingCurrent**: Max allowed charging current in A
**MaxDynamicCurrent**: Max. dynamic current (e.g. set over API or Modbus TCP) of this station or the loadmanagement group of the station if the station is in a group. in A
**MaxLoadmanagementGroupCurrent**: Max. current of the loadmanagement group of this station (if there is any) in A
**MaxStationCurrent**: Max. current of the station in A
**MinStationCurrent**: Min. current of the station in A
**RSSI**: Received Signal Strength Indicator for the connection mode (wifi or mobile).
**State**: The state of the charging station
